DOC.detailed_description: We successfully establish ovarian cancer cell line ( OVTW-59 ) , derive ovarian endometrioid carcinoma ( EC ) , also establish ovarian EC invasion model . By use cDNA microarray quantitative reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction , identify insulin-like growth factor bind protein ( IGFBP ) -3 invasion suppressor gene , associate low cancer migration , invasion metastasis . Clinically , low IGFBP-3 find associate significantly high tumor grade , advanced stage poor survival patient EC tumor . Furthermore , prove IGFBP-3 expression correlate low Erk activation , effect activation Akt . All two signal transduction proteins crucial role cancer invasion . Recently , novel model ovarian EC formation endometriosis report , PTEN find major protein involve . Inactivation PTEN report ovarian EC tumor methylation suggest one major epigenetic change . This tumorigenesis model lot similarity establish invasion model . Therefore , plan study important PTEN expression ovarian EC inactivation PTEN IFGBP-3 methylation . Furthermore , study signal transduction pathway use PTEN IGFBP-3 transfection , plan study mutual interaction PTEN IGFBP-3 suppression tumor invasion ovarian EC .
